name: RURAL TECHNOLOGY AND MANAGEMENT KHADI AND VILLAGE INDUSTRIES SAMITI
briefDescription: Rural Technology and Management Khadi & Village Industries Samiti was initiated during August, 1995 with a group of like minded friends of the upliftment tribals and down trodden of ever neglected Golamunda and Dharamgarh block of Kalahandi district, Ordinarily upliftment aims at establishing a just sustainable, free and participatory society where each individual establish his livelihood.
